column3: Cardiff School of History, Archaeology and Religion
column5: Why study this courseThis vocational programme offers exceptional training in preventive conservation and the management of cultural and heritage collections, regardless of humanities or science background.Designed with entry to the heritage profession in mind, our stimulating MSc Care of Collections programme embodies elements of art and science tailored for a career in this highly rewarding field.
column7: For programme fees please visit our website: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
